snippet: Gregory Albanis has dealt with a turned-around ex-president (once) and rain (often) in his nearly two decades organizing New York University commencements.
abstract: Gregory Albanis, New York University's longtime director of special events, will step down after organizing his final commencement ceremony; in addition to organizing commencements, Albanis has organized ceremonies for every visiting major head of state for last 20 years.
lead_paragraph: Gregory Albanis has dealt with a turned-around ex-president (once) and rain (often) in his nearly two decades organizing New York University commencements.

headline.main: N.Y.U. Graduation Director to Follow Class of ’16 Off the Stage
headline.print_headline: Longtime Director of N.Y.U.’s Commencement Will Follow Class of ’16 Off the Stage
